Uses of Package
org.actioncontroller

  • Packages that use org.actioncontroller 
    Package Description
    org.actioncontroller
    Action Controller is a framework that takes "controller" classes and generates ApiControllerAction for each method annotated with a "routing mapper annotation" such as GET.
    org.actioncontroller.httpserver  
    org.actioncontroller.jmx  
    org.actioncontroller.json  
    org.actioncontroller.meta
    The meta-package contains annotations used on other annotations to attach behavior to the annotations.
    org.actioncontroller.servlet  
  • Classes in org.actioncontroller used by org.actioncontroller 
    Class Description
    ApiControllerAction
    The core of the framework.
    ApiControllerContext
    Extra initialization variables for the ActionControllers.
    ApiControllerMethodAction
    Represents a single action that can be performed on a controller.
    ClientCertificate
    Extract the HTTPS Client Certificate from the request
    ContentBody
    Set the return value in the content body with an optional content-type
    ContentLocationHeader
    Set the method return value into the Content-location response header as String or URL.
    ContextUrl
    Extract the context URL into the parameter as URL or String
    DELETE
    Specifies that this method should handle HTTP DELETE requests
    GET
    Specifies that this method should handle HTTP GET requests.
    HttpActionException
    Indicates that an error happened during the invocation of an action and that the user agent should receive the HTTP HttpActionException.statusCode.
    HttpHeader
    When used on a parameter, maps the HTTP Request header to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    HttpRequestException
    Indicate that an action could not be executed due to missing or incorrect HTTP request values.
    HttpResponseHeader
    Maps the return value to the specified HTTP Response header
    PathParam
    Maps part of the HTTP request target to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    POST
    Specifies that this method should handle HTTP POST requests
    PUT
    Specifies that this method should handle HTTP PUT requests
    QueryString
    Maps the raw query part of the HTTP request target to the parameter.
    RequestParam
    Maps the HTTP request parameter to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    RequestParam.ClientIp
    Maps the HTTP client IP to the parameter as String.
    RequestParam.Principal
    NOT SUPPORTED ON JdkHttpExchange.
    RequestParam.RemoteUser
    NOT SUPPORTED ON JdkHttpExchange.
    SendRedirect
    Maps the method response value as an HTTP 302 redirect, supporting Strings and URLs.
    ServletUrl  
    SessionParameter
    Maps the parameter to the specified servlet session.
    TimerRegistry
    An extension point for measuring the execution of actions.
    TimerRegistry.Timer  
    UnencryptedCookie
    Maps the parameter to the specified HTTP request cookie, URL decoding and converting the type if necessary.
    UserContext

    The core of the framework.
    ApiControllerCompositeException
    Collects all exceptions during configuration of a specific controller
    ApiControllerContext
